mapper.select: SELECT i.prod_id AS prod_id, p.prod_name AS prod_name, i.warehouse_id AS send_wh, i.iv_current_quantity AS send_before_qty FROM prod p JOIN inventory i ON p.prod_id = i.prod_id JOIN warehouse w ON w.warehouse_id = i.warehouse_id WHERE p.prod_inbound_status = 'pis01' ORDER BY i.prod_id DESC
